name: Mind the Jumps
description:
A small project inspired by by Blackthornprod's 2021 Game Jam theme "Less is More", the player has only 4 jump to reach the goal and each jump is higher.

Commands:

    Arrow keys: move 

    Space/Arrow Up: Jump

    R: Restart level

    N: Change music track

Follow me on Instagram @lumso.dev

Music by Pix  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCr3D54lk90oa-ZN9-a1mv1Q
